For developers or users who prefer manual setup:
```bash

cd GLOW
pip install -r requirements.txt
python glow_app.py
```

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

### 1. Get Your Free API Key (30 seconds)

**Groq (Recommended)**:
1. Visit [console.groq.com](https://console.groq.com)
2. Sign up with Google/GitHub
3. Create API Key
4. Copy it (starts with `gsk_...`)

**Or Gemini (for Vision)**:
1. Visit [ai.google.dev](https://ai.google.dev)
2. Get API Key
3. Copy it

### 2. Install GLOW (2 minutes)

1. Download `GLOW-Setup-v1.0.5.exe`
2. Run the installer
3. Paste your API key when prompted
4. Click "Finish"

### 3. Start Using! (Immediately)

Double-click the GLOW desktop icon and try:

```
"Create a folder called Test on my desktop"
"Open YouTube and search for funny cats"
"Look at my screen and tell me what you see"
"Analyze this chart and save summary to report.txt"
```
